post_message: Mom Forgets Her Baby In A Shopping Cart A valley mom walked out of a Fry's store in Gilbert this afternoon but left her newborn behind in the shopping cart. 40 minutes later the panicked mom realized her mistake and went back to get him. The baby is back with his family tonight. Photo: Katie McCulley. Full story: @webpagelink
